alert.note: Alert for Apache (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 1:42PM MST until June 06 at 2:45PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Apache County in northeastern Arizona... * Until 245 PM MST. * At 142 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Red Rock, or 22 miles west of Shiprock, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Twin Falls and Teec Nos Pos. This includes Highway 160 between mile markers 456 and 470. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
